plot.content:
Playing on the hybrid of digital and physical art. The robot applies a very mecanical curve motion on a very analogic and organic process of eyedropping ink on the canvas. Diamine Amber ink on A4 Arches watercolor paper.

Plotted during a live stream on https://twitch.tv/greweb
